Downstream of Jiutian Waterfall
Youkai Mountain

An old house on the border of Gensokyo. The historical atmosphere exuded by the house itself seems to reject all visitors. For some reason, there are some things in this house that seem to be props from the human world. For example, machines with unknown uses, books and magazines whose contents cannot be understood. The iron box used as a video receiver in the outside world is nothing more than a container for spiritual energy. "Things that can reflect the human form can easily have a soul," she told her shikigami. The youkai of the realm "Yakumo Murasaki" lives here.

An old house on the border of Gensokyo. The historical atmosphere exuded by the house itself seems to reject all visitors. For some reason, there are some things in this house that seem to be props from the human world. For example, machines with unknown uses, books and magazines whose contents cannot be understood. The iron box used as a video receiver in the outside world is nothing more than a container for spiritual energy. "Things that can reflect the human form can easily have a soul," she told her shikigami. The youkai of the realm "Yakumo Murasaki" lives here.

Among the monsters in Gensokyo, Yakumo Zi has existed since a long time ago, and her power is quite strong. Possesses the ability to open gaps. Whether the thing coming from the other side of the gap is a mysterious drifter or a gap in the dimension, even Zi himself can't predict
Yakumo purple
Yokai of the Realm

If you want to say the most monster-like monster, you must mention Yakumo Zi's name. This yokai, because of her dangerous root-related abilities, elusive and inhuman personality, completely different behavioral principles from humans, etc., is a yokai that no one wants to be an enemy of.

Appearance is indistinguishable from humans. Like gorgeous clothes, holding a big parasol. The main activity time is night and daytime sleep. It's a typical monster. In addition, although it is said that he has been hibernating in winter, because he only talked about it and where he actually lives cannot be confirmed, so the degree of authenticity cannot be determined.

The ability to manipulate realms is a terrifying ability capable of overturning everything from the root. As we all know, the existence of things is based on the existence of realms. A lake does not exist without a water surface. Without ridges, neither mountains nor sky would exist. Without the great barrier of Gensokyo, Gensokyo would not exist. If the realm of all things did not exist, the world would be a huge whole. In other words, the ability to manipulate realms is the ability of logic to create and destroy. Essentially creating new existence, essentially negating existing existence. Among the abilities possessed by youkai, it is one of the most dangerous abilities that can rival the power of gods. In addition, it is also possible to teleport from anywhere instantly through the cracks in space, or to move parts of the body to other places. It is said that not only in physical space, but also in paintings, dreams, and stories can be moved. In addition, he also has a superhuman mind, especially strong in mathematics. Moreover, because he has lived for a long time, he has a wealth of knowledge and experience.
The Yakumo family achieved rapid development in the early stage by relying on the offerings of the barbarians
Rapid maneuverability using gaps

Nine-Tailed Tactician

It is said that the more tails a monster has, the more magical it is, and the longer it is, the smarter it is. The only one who can reach this highest peak is her, the nine-tailed fox Yakumolan. A fox with nine huge tails, its dazzling coat color creates a sense of sacredness.

And to recruit this strongest monster as a follower, the one who is mainly used for miscellaneous purposes is the strongest monster-Yakumo Zi. Blue is the shikigami of purple. As a shikigami, Lan obeys Zi's orders, and she can also drive the shikigami herself. That is the blue shikigami orange. But it seems that Cheng is not mature enough, and the work will not be entrusted to her.

Quite high intelligence, especially good at mathematics. It is said that even calculations to a degree unimaginable by humans can be completed in an instant. However, because she is good at calculation, she is more inclined to analyze and solve existing things than to conceive new concepts
